name: Project Kuragava
description:
Project Kuragava is a visual kinetic novel with a well-thought-out plot

The protagonist Yuki enters the Kuragawa Academy, it would seem the most ordinary academy, but in this academy he is the only guy.

It would seem that he should be happy, but when he arrives at the Academy, incomprehensible mystical things begin to happen, strange voices, and the students are not that ordinary.
